meanings.sent1: In the nineties, people enjoyed listening to CDs.
meanings.sent2: My parents often talk about the nineties as a fun time.
meanings.sent3: During the nineties, fashion trends were quite unique.
meanings.sent4: The nineties were like a colorful painting in history.
meanings.sent5: I can't forget the nineties with their iconic music and movies.

meanings.definition: A set of numbers ranging from 90 to 99.
meanings.sent1: The math problem involved adding numbers from the nineties.
meanings.sent2: I found a list of phone numbers all in the nineties.
meanings.sent3: The nineties on the clock always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a pattern resembling the nineties on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The nineties in the sequence stood out like bright stars.
